Name: esterquat production, from coconut oil and palm kernel oil | esterquat | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2023:Manufacture of soap and detergents, cleaning and polishing preparations, pe
Description: Average technology for the production of esterquat out of palm kernel oil and coconut oil by esterification with triethanolamine and quaternication with DMS. Data representing typical European production mix in the mid 90s.
